statements: SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'challenge';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'reward';
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM game_events WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'challenge' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'challenge'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'reward' AND event_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT event_name FROM game_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%fun%'
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2021-07-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date, reward_name FROM events JOIN rewards ON events.event_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE '%conference%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM events;
SELECT * FROM GameEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM GameEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM Challenges ORDER BY challenge_difficulty DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerRewards WHERE reward_quantity > 10;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM GameEvents JOIN Challenges ON GameEvents.event_id = Challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM GameEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM GameEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM Challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT event_description FROM GameEvents WHERE event_name = 'Epic Battle';
SELECT reward_name, reward_quantity FROM PlayerRewards WHERE reward_quantity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_difficulty DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_value < 1000 ORDER BY reward_value;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_level >= 5 AND player_score < 100;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_type FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT player_name, event_name, event_status FROM players JOIN player_events ON players.player_id = player_events.player_id JOIN events ON player_events.event_id = events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT players.player_name, events.event_name, player_events.event_status FROM players INNER JOIN player_events ON players.player_id = player_events.player_id INNER JOIN events ON player_events.event_id = events.event_id;

SELECT challenges.challenge_name, challenges.challenge_difficulty, player_rewards.reward_name FROM challenges LEFT JOIN player_rewards ON challenges.challenge_id = player_rewards.player_id WHERE challenges.challenge_difficulty > 3;
SELECT player_name, player_level, SUM(player_score) AS total_score FROM players GROUP BY player_name, player_level ORDER BY total_score DESC;
